00035 template <class T, class VEC> class AbstractOctree

00039   template <class V>class TreeNode
00040   {
00041   public:
00042       BoundingBox m_limit;
00043       int m_height;
00044       std::vector<V *> m_objectList;
00045       TreeNode *m_child[8];
00046   };

00048 public:
00052     AbstractOctree(int _height, BoundingBox _limit)
00053     {
00054       if(_height<=0)
00055       {
00056         std::cerr<<"The height of the tree is not valid\n";
00057         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00058       }
00059       m_root = new TreeNode <T>;
00060       createTree(m_root, _height, _limit);
00061     }
00062 
00064     virtual ~AbstractOctree()
00065     {
00066         deleteTreeNode(m_root);
00067         delete m_root;
00068     }

00070     void deleteTreeNode(TreeNode <T> *_node)
00071     {
00072       for(int i=0;i<8;++i)
00073       {
00074         if(_node->m_child[i]!=0)
00075         {
00076           deleteTreeNode(_node->m_child[i]);
00077           delete _node->m_child[i];
00078         }
00079       }
00080     }
00082     void createTree(TreeNode <T> *_parent,  int _height, BoundingBox _limit)
00083     {
00084       _parent->m_limit = _limit;
00085       _parent->m_height = _height;
00086       _parent->m_objectList.clear();
00087       _height--;
00088       if(_height == 0) // current level is leaves, no children
00089       {
00090         for(int i=0;i<8;++i)
00091         {
00092          _parent->m_child[i]= 0;
00093         }
00094       }
00095       else
00096       {
00097         BoundingBox childLimit;
00098         for(int i=0;i<8;++i)
00099         {
00100           _parent->m_child[i] = new TreeNode <T>;
00101           if(i%2==0) // i = 0, 2, 4, 6
00102           {
00103             childLimit.m_minx = _limit.m_minx;
00104             childLimit.m_maxx = (_limit.m_maxx+_limit.m_minx)/2.0;
00105           }
00106           else // i = 1, 3, 5, 7
00107           {
00108             childLimit.m_minx = (_limit.m_maxx+_limit.m_minx)/2.0;
00109             childLimit.m_maxx = _limit.m_maxx;
00110           }
00111           if(i==0 || i==1 || i==4 || i==5)
00112           {
00113             childLimit.m_miny = _limit.m_miny;
00114             childLimit.m_maxy = (_limit.m_maxy + _limit.m_miny)/2.0;
00115           }
00116           else
00117           {
00118             childLimit.m_miny = (_limit.m_maxy + _limit.m_miny)/2.0;
00119             childLimit.m_maxy = _limit.m_maxy;
00120           }
00121           if(i<4)
00122           {
00123             childLimit.m_minz = _limit.m_minz;
00124             childLimit.m_maxz = (_limit.m_maxz+_limit.m_minz)/2.0;
00125           }
00126           else
00127           {
00128             childLimit.m_minz = (_limit.m_maxz + _limit.m_minz)/2.0;
00129             childLimit.m_maxz = _limit.m_maxz;
00130           }
00131          createTree(_parent->m_child[i], _height, childLimit);
00132         } // end for
00133       }// end else
00134     }
00135 
00137     void addObject(T *_p)
00138     {
00139       addObjectToNode(m_root, _p);
00140     }
00142     bool checkBounds (const ngl::Vec3 &_pos, ngl::Real _r, const BoundingBox &_limit)
00143     {
00144       return (_pos.m_x-_r > _limit.m_maxx ||
00145               _pos.m_x+_r < _limit.m_minx ||
00146               _pos.m_y-_r > _limit.m_maxy ||
00147               _pos.m_y+_r < _limit.m_miny ||
00148               _pos.m_z-_r > _limit.m_maxz ||
00149               _pos.m_z+_r < _limit.m_minz
00150               );
00151     }
00152 
00154     bool checkBounds (const ngl::Vec4 &_pos, ngl::Real _r, const BoundingBox &_limit)
00155     {
00156       return (_pos.m_x-_r > _limit.m_maxx ||
00157               _pos.m_x+_r < _limit.m_minx ||
00158               _pos.m_y-_r > _limit.m_maxy ||
00159               _pos.m_y+_r < _limit.m_miny ||
00160               _pos.m_z-_r > _limit.m_maxz ||
00161               _pos.m_z+_r < _limit.m_minz
00162               );
00163     }
00165     bool checkBounds (const ngl::Vec2 &_pos, ngl::Real _r, const BoundingBox &_limit)
00166     {
00167       return (_pos.m_x-_r > _limit.m_maxx ||
00168               _pos.m_x+_r < _limit.m_minx ||
00169               _pos.m_y-_r > _limit.m_maxy ||
00170               _pos.m_y+_r < _limit.m_miny
00171               );
00172     }
00173     void addObjectToNode(TreeNode <T>  *_node, T *_p)
00174     {
00175       if(_node->m_height == 1) // this is the leaves level
00176       {
00177         _node->m_objectList.push_back(_p);
00178       }
00179       else
00180       {
00181         ngl::Vec3 pos = _p->getPosition();
00182         ngl::Real   r = 0.5;
00183                 //_p->getRadius();
00184         BoundingBox limit;
00185         for(int i=0;i<8;++i)
00186         {
00187           limit = _node->m_child[i]->m_limit;
00188           if(checkBounds(pos,r,limit))
00189           {
00190               continue;
00191           }
00192           addObjectToNode(_node->m_child[i], _p);
00193         }
00194       }
00195     }
00196 
00198     void clearTree()
00199     { std::cout<<"\n in clearTree ";
00200         clearObjectFromNode(m_root);
00201     }
00202 
00203     void clearObjectFromNode(TreeNode <T> *_node)
00204     {
00205       if(_node->m_height == 1)
00206       {
00207         _node->m_objectList.clear();
00208       }
00209       else
00210       {
00211         for(int i=0;i<8;++i)
00212         {
00213             clearObjectFromNode(_node->m_child[i]);
00214         }
00215       }
00216     }
00217 
00219     void    checkCollision()
00220     {
00221         checkCollisionOnNode(m_root);
00222     }
